# ColourfulPrint
ColourfulPrint for rainbow colours in Linux without extra newline character ("\n").

### [+] Installation 
Run these commands to clone and run ColourfulPrint.
```shell script
pkg install git -y 
pkg install python -y 
pip install colourfulprint
```

### [+] For Usage Example
Type 
```shell script
date | colourfulprint
```
